title: [PETITION]: GP's E ability ready/not ping should show how much charges he has instead of ready or no

replies.body: Please, do the same for Zyra's W. 1 or 2 seeds is not a small difference. :/
Apply this to all abilities that have a stack mechanic.

Right, absolutely right.

I mean, it'd be useful if it wasn't for the people that don't listen.

To be fair, Heimer doesn't need it as much since both allies and enemies can see the number of nuts around him, but it would be a nice change.

Other champions that have charge system abilities should have it too. {{champion:84}} {{champion:22}}  {{champion:42}}  {{champion:202}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:161}}
Diana has a charge system ability?
You're right, she doesn't. Thought her ult was charge based and forgot it had an interaction with her Q.
And with Rift, it should show how much time you have to use her, not that you have a charge,
